alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 10 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Collier County through 515 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cape Romano, or near Marco Island, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marco Island, Cape Romano, Marco Island Airport, Royal Palm Hammock, Key Marco, Cape Romano Aquatic Preserve and Goodland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
